app.title: TOML Visualizer
app.description: A simple toml visualizer tool built with AI (Because I can't write React). For people want to be familiar with toml format.

editor.defaultToml:
# This is a TOML document, and this line is a comment, parser will ignore this
# You can see more information by hovering on the icons, or array index (like [0]) in the tree
# Hover on the title you can see the website description

title = "TOML Example"  # Another comment

[owner]
name = "Tom Preston-Werner"
dob = 1979-05-27T07:32:00-08:00

[note]
single_line_string = "The quick 'brown fox'\njumps over the \"lazy dog\""
multi_line_string = """
The quick 'brown fox'
jumps over the \
"lazy dog"\
"""
"Key With Space" = "Value"
"Key With\nLine Break" = "Broke!"
"String with single quotes won't escape" = 'You see\nno line break'

[special_numbers]
inf = inf
nan = nan

[database]
enabled = true
ports = [ 8000, 8001, 8002 ]
data = [ ["delta", "phi"], [3.14] ]
temp_targets = { cpu = 79.5, case = 72.0 }

[servers]

[servers.alpha]
ip = "10.0.0.1"
role = "frontend"

[servers.beta]
ip = "10.0.0.2"
role = "backend"

[[clients]]
name = "Alice"
email = "alice@example.com"

[[clients]]
name = "Bob"
email = "bob@example.com"
active = true

[clients.info]
description = "Some description"

viewer.emptyMessage: Type TOML in the editor to see the visual result
viewer.itemIndexInArray: The {{place}}{{placeSuffix}} item in the array (at index {{index}})
